name: Grandpa Demetto
text: You can detach 1 material from your "Princess Cologne"; Special Summon up to 2 Normal Monsters with 0 ATK or DEF from your GY as Level 8 DARK monsters. If your Xyz Monster activates an effect by detaching a material(s) that was originally a Normal Monster: You can target that Xyz Monster and 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that opponent's monster, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to that Xyz Monster's Rank x 300. You can only use each effect of "Grandpa Demetto" once per turn.
